journey_start.text: Raj had come a long way. He wandered through lands with a single purpose.

choices.text: Notice the people walking beside him.

companions_join.text: Travelers, fighters, and guides joined Raj along the way.

companions_leave.text: One by one, they left. Raj did not stop to look back.

dragon.text: By the time Raj stood before the dragon, their faces had faded.

victory.text: When the dragon fell, there was no victory waiting for him.

spell_book.text: Every page was blank. Then faint markings appeared. The book was never meant to hold power—it was meant to hold people.

choices.text: Write the names of those who walked beside you.

chapter_end.text: Raj continued his journey—not chasing an end, but finding his way back home.
